00008 require_once 'PHPUnit/Autoload.php';
00009 require_once 'src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00010 require_once 'src/QueryPath/Extension/QPDB.php';
00011 require_once 'src/QueryPath/Extension/QPTPL.php';
00012 
00013 QPDB::baseDB('sqlite:./test/db/qpTest.db');
00014 
00015 /**
00016  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00017  */
00018 class QPDBTest extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00019   private $dsn = 'sqlite:./test/db/qpTest.db';
00020   
00021   public function setUp() {
00022     $this->db = QPDB::getBaseDB();
00023     $this->db->exec('CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS qpdb_test (colOne, colTwo, colThree)');
00024     
00025     $stmt = $this->db->prepare(
00026       'INSERT INTO qpdb_test (colOne, colTwo, colThree) VALUES (:one, :two, :three)'
00027     );
00028     
00029     for ($i = 0; $i < 5; ++$i) {
00030       $vals = array(':one' => 'Title ' . $i, ':two' => 'Body ' . $i, ':three' => 'Footer ' . $i);
00031       $stmt->execute($vals);
00032       $stmt->closeCursor();
00033     }
00034   }
00035   
00036   public function tearDown() {
00037     $this->db->exec('DROP TABLE qpdb_test');
00038     //$s = $this->db->prepare('DELETE FROM qpdb_test');
00039     //$s->execute();
00040     //$s->closeCursor();
00041   }
00042   
00043   public function testQueryInto() {
00044     // This is the only query that uses dbInit().
00045     $sql = 'SELECT "Hello", "World"';
00046     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->dbInit($this->dsn)->queryInto($sql)->doneWithQuery();
00047     $this->assertEquals('HelloWorld', $qp->top()->find('body')->text());
00048     
00049     $template = '<?xml version="1.0"?><li class="colOne"/>';
00050     $sql = 'SELECT * FROM qpdb_test';
00051     $args = array();
00052     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')->append('<ul/>')->children()->queryInto($sql, $args, $template)->doneWithQuery();
00053     //$qp->writeHTML();
00054     $this->assertEquals(5, $qp->top()->find('li')->size());
00055     
00056     $template = '<?xml version="1.0"?><tr><td class="colOne"/><td class="colTwo"/><td class="colThree"/></tr>';
00057     $sql = 'SELECT * FROM qpdb_test';
00058     $args = array();
00059     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')
00060       ->append('<table><tbody><tr><th>Title</th><th>Body</th><th>Foot</th></tr></tbody></table>')
00061       ->find('tbody')
00062       ->queryInto($sql, $args, $template)
00063       ->doneWithQuery()
00064       ;//->writeHTML();
00065     $this->assertEquals('Footer 4', $qp->top()->find('td:last')->text());
00066   }
00067   
00068   /*
00069   public function xtestExec() {
00070     $sql = 'INSERT INTO qpdb_test (colOne, colTwo, colThree) VALUES ("o", "t", "tr")';
00071     $qp = qp()->exec($sql)->doneWithQuery();
00072     $this->assertEquals(6, $qp->query('SELECT count(*) as c FROM qpdb_test')->getStatement()->fetchObject()->c);
00073     $qp->doneWithQuery();
00074   }

00076   
00077   public function testQueryChains() {
00078     $sql = 'SELECT * FROM qpdb_test';
00079     $args = array();
00080     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body') // Open a stub HTML doc and select <body/>
00081       ->append('<h1></h1>') // Add <h1/>
00082       ->children()  // Select the <h1/>
00083       //->dbInit($this->dsn) // Connect to the database
00084       ->query($sql, $args) // Execute the SQL query
00085       ->nextRow()  // Select a row. By default, no row is selected.
00086       //->withEachRow()
00087       ->appendColumn('colOne') // Append Row 1, Col 1 (Title 0)
00088       ->parent() // Go back to the <body/>
00089       ->append('<p/>') // Append a <p/> to the body
00090       ->find('p')  // Find the <p/> we just created.
00091       ->nextRow() // Advance to row 2
00092       ->prependColumn('colTwo') // Get row 2, col 2. (Body 1)
00093       ->columnAfter('colThree') // Get row 2 col 3. (Footer 1)
00094       ->doneWithQuery() // Let QueryPath clean up.
00095       ;//->writeHTML(); // Write the output as HTML.
00096     $this->assertEquals('Title 0', $qp->top()->find('h1')->text());
00097     $this->assertEquals('Body 1', $qp->top()->find('p')->text());
00098     
00099     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body') // Open a stub HTML doc and select <body/>
00100       ->append('<table><tbody/></table>')
00101       ->find('tbody')
00102       ->query('SELECT * FROM qpdb_test LIMIT 2')
00103       ->withEachRow()
00104       ->appendColumn('colOne')
00105       ->doneWithQuery();
00106     $this->assertEquals('Title 0Title 1', $qp->top()->find('tbody')->text());
00107     
00108     $wrap = '<tr><td/></tr>';    
00109     $qp = qp(QueryPath::HTML_STUB, 'body')
00110       ->append('<table><tbody/></table>')
00111       ->find('tbody')
00112       ->query('SELECT * FROM qpdb_test LIMIT 2')
00113       ->withEachRow()
00114       ->appendColumn('colOne', $wrap)
00115       ->doneWithQuery()
00116       ;//->writeHTML();
00117     $this->assertEquals('Title 0', $qp->top()->find('td:first')->text());
00118   }
00119 }
